General.Name: Starcore International Mines Ltd
General.Description: Starcore International Mines Ltd., a mineral resource company, engages in exploring, extracting, and processing mineral resources in Mexico. The company, through its subsidiary, Compañia Minera Peña de Bernal, S.A. de C.V., explores for gold and silver deposits. Its principal property is the San Martin mine consists of 8 mining claims that covers an area of 12,991.78 hectares located in Queretaro, Mexico. The company was formerly known as Starcore International Ventures Ltd. and changed its name to Starcore International Mines Ltd. in February 2008. Starcore International Mines Ltd. was incorporated in 1980 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 580 Hornby Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 3B6
